data.scheme_name: Madhya Pradesh MSME Development Policy 2021 - Reimbursement to Patents - Existing
data.benefits: The scheme offers 100% reimbursement, up to a maximum of Rs. 5 lakhs, for MSME units on expenses incurred for patents and IPR registration during the policy period.
data.eligibility: All MSME units in manufacturing sector for expenditure incurred on patents/IPR registration during the policy period.
data.beneficiaries: All MSME units in manufacturing sector for expenditure incurred on patents/IPR registration during the policy period.
data.nodal_agency: Department of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises
data.context:
1. The Micro, Small, and Medium Enterprises (MSME) sector is a key driver of socio-economic growth in India, rapidly emerging as one of the most vibrant and dynamic sectors of the economy. 
  2. MSMEs provide the largest share of employment after the primary sector, addressing one of the country’s main challenges: employment generation. 
  3. Recognizing the critical role of MSMEs, the Government of Madhya Pradesh (GoMP) prioritizes the development of this sector, acknowledging its importance for sustainable economic growth and job creation.
data.objective:
1. Achieving the state’s goal of overall industrial development and MSME competitiveness. 
  2. Creating enabling infrastructure. 
  3. Providing a conducive ecosystem and promoting inclusive growth for MSMEs. 
  4. Providing an opportunity to young entrepreneurs through instilling employment generation.
data.description: The scheme offers 100% reimbursement, up to a maximum of Rs. 5 lakhs, for MSME units on expenses incurred for patents and IPR registration during the policy period.
data.how_to_apply:
Industry can Register themselves on the Common portal to avail various services:
https://invest.mp.gov.in/CM/registration
data.funding_facilitator: Madhya Pradesh Industrial Development Co. Ltd., Industries Commissioner, M.P
data.funding_mechanism: Incentives are released to eligible MSMEs, following eligibility assessment and approval by relevant committees.
data.additional_info:
Ineligible Industry : 

  • Products prohibited for manufacturing by Central or State Government, Industrial units set up by central or state government or their undertaking, 
  • Defaulter of state government/state government undertaking, 
  • All type of oil refineries, 
  • Electricity generation units, 
  • Units set up in Special Economic Zone (SEZ).
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Copy of Udyam Registration Certificate 
2. Self-Certified Copy of Partnership Deed / Memorandum and Articles of Association (as applicable) 
3. Self-Certified Copy of land purchase deed (if land is owned by applicant) 
4. PAN Card
5. Detailed Project Report
6. Memorandum of Article (MOA)
7. Balance sheet for Annual Turnover
8. Udyam Registration Certificate
9. Caste certificate(If Applicable)
10. Copy of the invoices, cash bills and stamped receipt duly attested
data.checklist_info_d:
Address: 
3, Udhyog Bhavan BSF Rd Udhyog Kshetra,
Pologround Square, Mari Mata Square, 
Indore, Madhya Pradesh 452003

Contact Details: 07312421109
Email Id: NA
data.beneficiary: Specific Manufacturing Industries - All Entities - Madhya Pradesh - All MSMEs
data.lifecycle: Establishment of brand and enhance quality output
